analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Pairs

original: 8.54. Kilesasaṅkiliṭṭhaduka🔽Nakilesañceva naasaṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakileso ceva naasaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.🔽Naasaṅkiliṭṭhañceva nano ca kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭho ceva nano ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: kilesa saṅkiliṭṭha duka  na kilesam ca iva na asaṅkiliṭṭham ca dhammam paṭicca na kilesaḥ ca iva na asaṅkiliṭṭhaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi  na asaṅkiliṭṭham ca iva na no ca kilesam dhammam paṭicca na asaṅkiliṭṭhaḥ ca iva na no ca kilesaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nakilesañceva naasaṅkiliṭṭhañca naasaṅkiliṭṭhañceva nano ca kilesañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakileso ceva naasaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: na kilesam ca iva na asaṅkiliṭṭham ca na asaṅkiliṭṭham ca iva na no ca kilesam ca dhammam paṭicca na kilesaḥ ca iva na asaṅkiliṭṭhaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi 🔽hetuyā nava pe avigate nava
